name: Dialectic
shortDescription: Dialectic aims to achieve reasoned communication between group members about projects before the ultimate truth of those projects is announced to the public.
technoUsed: MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js, React.js, Passport.js, Bcrypt.js, Draft.js, SASS

name: Wowscrape
shortDescription: Wowscrape allows quests to scrape World of Warcraft related news articles from Wowhead.com. Users can save and append notes to different articles.
technoUsed: Express, Mongoose, Body-Parser, Morgan, Cheerio, Request

name: Donut Clicky
shortDescription: Memory based game with the goal of clicking all of the pictures without clicking the same one twice.

name: GifTastic Food
shortDescription: Press a button to see gifs of your favorite foods! Don't see your favorite food as a button? Create your own button and try again!
